name: Exro Technologies Inc.
longDescription: Exro Technologies Inc is a Canadian based company commercializing patented technology designed to advance existing rotating electric machines. It is engaged in the production of electronics for electric motors and generators. The company serves car/truck, bus, generator, appliance, elevator, escalator, conveyor, ship drive, fan, pump, crane, HVAC, compressor, vacuum, train, industrial motor, wind turbine, and subway markets.

fullAddress: 1177 West Hastings Street,Suite 2300, Vancouver, BC, CA
